definition: A person who has successfully completed a course of study at a higher educational institution, typically a university or college, and has been awarded a degree or diploma. This term is commonly used to refer to individuals who have recently graduated from an academic program.

examples.german: Der Absolvent hat seinen Abschluss gemacht.
examples.english: The graduate has completed his degree.

examples.german: Die Absolventenfeier findet am Samstag statt.
examples.english: The graduation ceremony takes place on Saturday.

examples.german: Der Absolvent wurde f√ºr seine Leistungen ausgezeichnet.
examples.english: The graduate was honored for his achievements.

examples.german: Die Absolventin hat einen Job in einer renommierten Firma gefunden.
examples.english: The female graduate has found a job in a prestigious company.

examples.german: Die Absolventen sind stolz auf ihre erreichten Ziele.
examples.english: The graduates are proud of their achieved goals.
